channel.title: Make port require key?
channel.description:
How do i make a portal that teleports to the cordinates i want? but in order to use that portal you must have a key.
whats the code?

item.title: Make port require key?
item.dc:creator: @runevault runevault
item.description:
@runevault wrote:

ok so i put this

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, id, 0, 10); }

anywhere in client.java

Then where it says case 121

add

NewObjects();

then in case

132

add

if (objectID == objectid) {
if (playerHasItem(itemid)) {
teleportToX = xcoord;
teleportToY = ycoord;
} else {
sendMessage(“Message”);
}
}[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2008, 11:42:50 PM[/size][hr]im confused
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 15, 2008, 11:52:42 PM[/size][hr]i still dont get it? please help

item.title: Make port require key?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Add these in client.java

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){ if(p != null){ client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){ if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){ person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}} public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(xxxx, yyyy, id, 0, 10); }
Replace xxxx and yyyy with the x and y coords of the object. Replace the id with the object id
then find case 121: and in there add
NewObjects();
